hero.headline: Experienced Trial Lawyers Fighting for You
hero.subheadline: Personal Injury • Business Litigation • Family Law • Free Consultations

about.title: Results-Driven Legal Representation
about.text: Hartford Law Group has recovered over $150 million for our clients since 2003. Our team of 12 attorneys brings decades of courtroom experience to every case. We work on contingency for personal injury cases - you pay nothing unless we win. From complex business disputes to sensitive family matters, we provide the aggressive representation you deserve.

services.name: Personal Injury
services.description: Car accidents, medical malpractice, workplace injuries. We fight insurance companies so you get fair compensation.

services.name: Business Litigation
services.description: Contract disputes, partnership conflicts, intellectual property. Protecting your business interests.

services.name: Family Law
services.description: Divorce, custody, adoption, prenuptial agreements. Compassionate guidance through difficult transitions.

services.name: Estate Planning
services.description: Wills, trusts, probate, asset protection. Secure your family's future with proper planning.

testimonials.name: Marcus J.
testimonials.content: After my accident, the insurance company offered $15,000. Hartford Law got me $380,000. They changed my life.

testimonials.name: Catherine & Robert M.
testimonials.content: Handled our business dispute professionally and efficiently. Saved our company from a frivolous lawsuit.

testimonials.name: Stephanie T.
testimonials.content: My divorce was complicated with significant assets involved. They protected my interests every step of the way.
